title: The strange case of Trump's missing Greenland envoy
shortDescription: Louisiana Gov. Jeff Landry has played a low-key-to-vanishing role over Greenland since his appointment as Trump's special envoy to the Arctic island.

title: Why does Trump want Greenland? Polls show a US takeover is unpopular
shortDescription: What does Greenland have that Donald Trump wants? He said US needs control of the island for national security. What Denmark and Greenland leaders say

title: Trump threatens Insurrection Act as Minnesota shootings spark unrest
shortDescription: Trump accused demonstrators of "attacking" ICE agents and said if Minnesota authorities don't respond, he "will institute the INSURRECTION ACT."

title: GOP kills bill on military action in Venezuela
shortDescription: Several lawmakers who initially supported the measure switched their votes after pressure from President Donald Trump.

title: US seizes Venezuela-tied tanker before Trump-Machado meetup, officials
shortDescription: Another Venezuela-linked tanker has been seized, U.S. officials said, prior to meeting between Trump and opposition leader Maria Corina Machado.

title: Trump threatens Insurrection Act amid growing unrest in Minneapolis
shortDescription: Wednesday's shooting followed days of chaotic clashes in Minneapolis since the fatal shooting of Renee Good by an ICE agent a week ago.

title: Hundreds of thousands of dollars raised for Ford worker who heckled Trump
shortDescription: The incident that led to the worker being suspended happened Jan. 13 during a visit by Trump to Ford's Dearborn Truck Plant.

title: Trump: Reza Pahlavi is 'very nice' but can he garner support in Iran?
shortDescription: President Trump expressed uncertainty over whether Iranian opposition figure Reza Pahlavi would be able to muster support in Iran to eventually take over.

title: New bill allows whole milk back in school meals
shortDescription: President Trump signed a bill allowing schools to offer whole milk and 2% milk, reversing Obama-era policy that only allowed low-fat milk options.

title: Trump, GOP kill Senate bill to curb military action in Venezuela
shortDescription: The White House's efforts to quell Senate Republican opposition to its actions in Venezuela came to a head with a maneuver to kill a war powers bill.

title: Trump says Iran stopped killing protesters
shortDescription: President Donald Trump claimed Iran has stopped killing protesters and vowed strong action if executions resume.

title: What is the Trump diet? Fast food, lots of snacking
shortDescription: See President Donald Trump’s well‑known love of fast food, fueled by burgers, fries, and endless Diet Coke.

title: Trump's military interventions have gone 'too far,' new polls say
shortDescription: After Venezuela, Trump is doubling down on threats of military action against Iran and Greenland. New polling found most Americans aren't on board.

title: Trump concerned about 3rd impeachment as midterms approach. What to know
shortDescription: Donald Trump thinks he could be impeached for a third time if Republicans lose the midterms. If he is, he may not be removed from office. Here's why.

title: Trump says US needs Greenland for 'national security'
shortDescription: President Trump reiterated his position that the U.S. "needs" Greenland for national security purposes.

title: Is 'conquering' Greenland Trump's plan? Danish official thinks it is.
shortDescription: 'We didn’t manage to change the American position,' the Danish foreign minister said after a meeting to discuss Trump's bid to acquire Greenland.

title: Trump announces Iran is no longer killing anti-government protesters
shortDescription: Trump announced that Iran is stopping the killing of anti-government protesters after he threatened to intervene.

title: Trump wants to ‘conquer’ Greenland, says Danish FM
shortDescription: Danish Foreign Minister Lars Løkke Rasmussen said he "agreed to disagree" with the US position on Greenland after a meeting with JD Vance.
